Text: #G10# As a site member, I want to search for profiles based on a few fields, so that I can find others I might want to connect with.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to post comments about articles, so that others can read them.
#G10# As a site administrator, I want to create an Other Course or Event that is not charged a listing fee, so that the Scrum Alliance doesn't charge itself for Scrum Gatherings that it puts on.
#G10# As a site member, I want to view the profiles of other members, so that I can find others I might want to connect with.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to subscribe to an RSS feed of articles, so that I can read them without visiting the site.
#G10# As a site member, I want to mark my profile as private in which case only my name will appear, so that no one can learn things about me I don't want shared.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to turn a course into an event or an event into a course, so that I can correctly classify anything that was entered incorrectly.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to read information of relevance only to trainers, so that the Scrum Alliance can share information with me easily.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to be able to read some of your articles, so that I can learn without first joining the site.
#G10# As a site member, I want to mark my email address as private even if the rest of my profile is not, so that no one can contact me.
#G10# As a site admin, I want to approve each help wanted ad before it gets to the site, so that we're sure of the quality of jobs being listed.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to see the upcoming courses are what I want visitors to notice, so that they register and there's a benefit to my membership.
#G10# As a site visitor, I want to know as I glance around the home page what on earth a CSM is and why I'd want to be one, so that I read more.
#G10# As a site member, I want to download the latest training material and methodology PDFs, so that I have them.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to list my upcoming classes in my profile and include a link to a detailed page about each, so that prospective attendees can find my courses.
#G10# As a site editor, I want to update any course or event, so that I can fix things the original author hasn't.
#G10# As a trainer, I want to delete one of my courses or events, so that it's no longer listed if I cancel for some reason.
#G10# As a site member, I want to send an email to any member via a form, so that we can connect.
#G10# As a site member, I want to fill out an application to become a Certified Scrum Practitioner, so that I can earn that designation.
